Notes: Brexit referendum: Leave 52%. High sovereignty phenotype (Parliamentary sovereignty, opt-outs, dualism). Post-2008+2015 migration crisis.
Brexit finalized. UK reclaimed border control, regulatory autonomy. Sovereignty phenotype strengthened post-exit.
Catalonia illegal referendum. Central state sovereignty (Spanish unity) defeats sub-state sovereignty claim. Art 155 invoked.
Trump withdraws from TPP day 1. 'America First' meme. High sovereignty phenotype, limited international integration.
Trump exits Paris Agreement citing sovereignty over climate policy. Dualist tradition enables easy withdrawal.
Orb√°n 'illiberal democracy' challenges EU values. Rule of law backsliding. Constitutional amendments resist CJEU authority.
Orb√°n refuses EU migrant quotas, builds border fence. 2015 migration crisis catalyzes sovereignty assertion.
Venezuela denounces IACHR. Authoritarian sovereignty phenotype. Zero compliance history.
Trinidad withdraws from IACHR over death penalty dispute. Sovereignty assertion against supranational court.
Duterte withdraws from ICC citing sovereignty and colonial legacy. High sovereignty phenotype.
Rwanda withdraws from African Court individual petition protocol. Authoritarian sovereignty.
Tanzania follows Rwanda in withdrawing from African Court. Sovereignty over human rights adjudication.
Benin withdraws from African Court. Pattern of sovereignty assertion across continent.
Poland judicial reforms defy CJEU. Constitutional Tribunal asserts Polish law > EU law. Ongoing conflict.
Polish Constitutional Tribunal rules EU law incompatible with constitution. Direct challenge to supremacy doctrine.
Le Pen Frexit platform loses 66-34. Sovereignty meme strong (48% first round) but globalism holds.
Le Pen again loses but closer (42%). Sovereignty phenotype rising. Post-COVID context.
Merkel 'Wir schaffen das' welcomes 1M migrants. Globalism commitment but triggers sovereignty backlash (AfD rise).
Argentina initially resists IACHR Fontevecchia ruling. CSJN asserts sovereignty. Later complies partially.
Argentina complies with multiple IACHR rulings post-Fern√°ndez. Sovereignty phenotype moderated.
Netherlands among strongest EU integrationists. Monist tradition, direct effect, constitutional supremacy of treaties.
Costa Rica 100% IACHR compliance. Sala IV gives treaties constitutional rank. Ultra-low sovereignty phenotype.
Russia expelled from CoE post-Ukraine invasion. Constitutional amendments 2020 asserted Russian law supremacy.
Bush refuses Kyoto ratification. Dualist tradition + Senate sovereignty over treaties.
China joins WTO but rejects ICJ jurisdiction. Selective integration preserving CCP sovereignty.
Maastricht creates EU citizenship, expands CJEU authority. Sovereignty pooling reaches peak.
Schengen abolishes internal borders. Ultimate globalism phenotype: border control surrendered.
Erdoƒüan post-coup crackdown ends EU accession. Emergency powers invoked. Sovereignty over liberal democracy.
Swiss referendum rejects EEA membership. Direct democracy expresses sovereignty preference over integration.
Norway referendum rejects EU membership (second time). Sovereignty preference despite economic integration.
